name: Question Object File Format
summary: Learn about .QUOX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: By using multiple QUOX files, teachers can quickly construct online quizzes, worksheets in the .DOCX format, and other exams.
NOTE: QUOX files use a proprietary implementation of the Open Office XML standard.

description: File created in the Question Object File Format, a format used for exchanging quiz questions for exams; may include text, pictures, and MathML, a mathematics language; used for sharing quiz questions between teachers.
